title: @RIOT Leavebuster is Broken
body:
20 minute low priority Q = Uninstall 

There are better games that don't punish their community without justification.

(I never quit, 3v5 = sit at fountain. Telstra NBN isp = outages)

replies.body:
>3v5 = sit at fountain

No matter what your personal beliefs are, that's still 'leaving' in their eyes. Just don't do it and you won't get punished.
